title: touristy but maple syrup and fudge samples
text: Mostly a tourist bus stop. Place has a restaurant, and gift shop and Maple syrup bottleing display and a fudge making shop. Sample real local syrups and homemade fudge. Purchase to take home. Tourist photo taking opts here.

title: History buffs of war of 1812
text: Just riding by chance and found this old fort. The tour included with the entrance fee is well worth the price to get knowledge of the war of 1812. Learned many things of the war I never knew about. Interesting information of the place, the fort, and the pros and cons of a war that should have not been had.

title: Great homemade ice cream
text: Yummy yummy ! The ice cream flavors are great. Specialty cones too. Rich flavor ice cream. If you like ice cream, do not bypass this place.

title: Very nice park
text: Many gardens to see. Also a Butterfly garden. The flowers will depend on the time of year that you are there so I can not tell you what to look for. Very well maintained and a nice peaceful way to spend your day. Many picture opts.

title: A must see area.
text: This is a little out of the way place from Niagara Falls. Maybe 5 to 10 miles away. But if you have a car, it is a place you have to visit. The town has many flowers along the sidewalk and also hanging from the lampposts. Horse and buggy rides available. Many restaurants and shops to wander in. So pretty and area, you have to have your camera ready. Worth the drive to see.
place: Niagara on the Lake Heritage District

title: Very nice monastary.
text: The grounds are very nice and peaceful. It is open to the publc and there is no charge to be on the grounds. If you go into the temple you need to take off your shoes and a cash donation is accepted. Monks are around to greet you and give you infomation.

title: Must see by tourists.
text: This clock has been here for many years. The floral arrangement is different every year. So if you have been here before, ithe flower arrrangement is different every year. Not a walkable place if you do not have a car but the tour buses take you there.

title: Glitzy Vegas style resort.
text: When you walk into entrance, you feel like you are in a Las Vegas resort. Shopping mall, Casino, Pricey Restaurants. If you like casinos, then this one is the best one in Niagara Falls.

title: Hiking up Clifton Hill, it is in a most favorable place to take a break
text: The Ice cream is good but like in most trouist areas, it is a little overpriced for what you get. If you like to play, you got to pay !

title: good location
text: The food is average and the service is mediocre to average. The location is very good for the average tourist with walking distance to the glitzy area of town. Mostly suited to the younger noisy crowd. Loud music, draft beers and burger type food.

title: A grand site to see
text: The views are spectacular and easy to see from the Canadian side. You must see in the day time and come back to see at night with the colored lights after 8pm. Spectacular !

title: Great place for steak and seafood
text: We went twice in the 3 days we spent in Niagara Falls. They had a early bird special for Prime Rib for $18.99 that we could not pass up. With a good US to Canadian exchange rate it was a bargain. Prices in the area are higher because of the tourist area but this was a bargain in my view. The place is very clean and the wait staff are very prompt and courtous and professional. I highly recommend this place.

title: budget minded hotel
text: The hotel was in much needed renovation. Advantage was free breakfast, free ample parking and free wi-fi. Location is good for wallking to sites and close to many restaurants. Mostly I would say it is clean but the rugs in the room and hallways needs to be changed. Check in was good and the staff were friendly.
place: Clifton Victoria Inn at the Falls

title: Spacious museum with outstanding architectual design.
text: The place is much larger than it seems. The rooms are spacious and the items on display and easy to view and one of the most easy places to get around and view. Has many types of items for all kinds of interest. You can spend at least 2 to 3 days admiring all the items on display. A must see!

title: Best place for familys and adults alike
text: One of the bes aquariums to visit with kids. Has snack bar and touch center if you want. The moving sidewalk takes you around the large window aquarium and see the fish up close with sharks and rays and large turtles swim right by your face and over your head. It was great and loved it very much,

title: Wonderful place to view the entire city of Toronto
text: The views from the tower are great. You get 360 degree views from around the observation deck. Glass floor to look down the the street level if you are not afraid of heights. The elverator ride is smooth and quick to the deck.

title: Great place for food and drink.
text: Mostly for brews and pub food but great to wander the street for all kinds of food and drink and trinckets to buy. Kind of a Soho, hippie kind of place.

title: Most unusual mansion
text: A very interesting place and historical and unique place to visit. The story of the building of the place and its sugnificance is very educational and interesting

title: Chinese fast food like restaurant food
text: The food court is a fabulous place for Chinese food fast but similar to what you would get in a restaurant. The service is quick and the prices are very low for the amount of food you get. We shared one order for the two of us and it was more than enough to eat. You can get 3 bbq items with white rice and a side soup for only $7.99 Can. that is about $6.00 US. And it was so fresh and good !
place: Food Court at First Markham Place

title: Where the Chinese go to eat !
text: This place serves authentic style Chinese food. It is very busy every evening. Great food at resonable prices and large portions. Loved it so much we went 3 times in the 3 days we were in Markham

title: very nice hotel
text: The room was very clean and well maintained. Although we were only a couple their was enough room for 4 if needed. The room had 2 queen beds and 1 bed was in a separate room with closeoff. Had a small kitchen including a full size refridgerator, stove, microwave and coffee maker.

title: Park and Fly shuttle service
text: I have used this facility many times before. I have done the Sleep, Park, and Fly and also just the Park and Fly. This time I used the Park and Fly and they have changed so that you need to leave your car with the keys at a check in desk. The attendant was not friendly at all and I did not like the idea it was not just a lock it and leave it type of parking any longer. When I came back from my trip and picked up my car to go home it all seemed fine. A day later I realized that the attendant or parker of the car and stolen dollar bills I had in my visor carrier and all of the coinage in my seat side carrier. Amount is not the issue since it was less than $20 dollars but beware, do not leave any money or change in the car. It will not be there when you get back. I am very disheartened that this happened and now I think I will use a different place to park from now on. A small amount of chunk change and they lose a customer ! I will not be back again.
place: Comfort Inn & Suites Boston Logan International Airport

title: Highlights of Athens
text: The stadium is a great place to visit and see. Amazingly in the heart of the city and such a clean and neat place to see.

title: Amazing place to see
text: A must place to see and behold the wonders of the construction of such a place of historic proportions. The highlight of the city of Athens.

title: Highlights of Athens
text: Just to be able to view a place that was built so long ago is a fastening sight to see. So amazing place and the views of the city of Athens from the hilltop is great. A must see place to see and be amazed of a place in history.

title: clean cars and efficient service
text: Was the first time using this company but if I ever get back to Rome, I definatelt would not hesitate to use them again. The booking is easy and they don't even need to have a deposit to book. Pay the driver after they transport you to your destination. They were on time and the cars are clean and the service is great. I used them to transport us from the airport to the cruise terminal and picked us up after the cruise to transport us back to the airport. Fast and efficient at a very resonable cost.

title: Great summertime day trip
text: The park is always clean and the ocean breeze is great in the summertime. Plenty of space to do some serious walking or jogging and a great place to have a picnic or family outing for the day. Plenty of area to park with no hassles. Plenty of space if you want to fly a kite or have a softball game. Bring your bike and ride the trails. Great place to go if you have nothing else to do. I highly recommend taking the family for the day.

title: Small Mansion but well worth the visit
text: This is a smaller type Mansion not in Newport but close by. The hosts are very friendly and the place is very well kepted and many interesting facts about the original owners. Well decorated at Christmas time and is open all year round. Good to vist in Spring and Summer to see the flowers and the garden but also at Christmas time because of the decorations.

title: Buffets in RI
text: The place is out of the way and off the main street. The food is brought out constantly because there is not a large amount of each item on display. This is a good thing since I would assume it is fresh and not been lying around for a while. The fried items seemed to be over done and the food is relatively bland. The best item I found was the Prime Rib which was medium rare and quite tasty and tender. The steam tables kept most items just warm and not really hot. The prime rib is served only on weekends and at a price of $13.99 per person would make it a bargain just to have that and whatever sides with it. Place has a full bar and stocked quite well including polynesion drinks available. Has sushi items and Chinese food items as well as spagetti and soups and even clam cakes. I would not highly recommend but it still is a good bargain once in a while.

title: Good bbq and quick service
text: The place is not too busy if you go early. The service is extremely fast and efficient. The wait staff is very accomodating and will try to satisfy all your wishes as to the order. The prices are reasonable and the quanity is good.

title: Great bar and grill type restaurant
text: The service in this restaurant is always fast and efficient. Manager always comes around to ask if everything is all right, The prices are very resonable and the specials are a good deal. Good place to get a decent meal at a fair price with no frills or bother

title: Favorite family restaurant
text: This is a very popular family restaurant and the food is always fresh and good. Service is very commendable and efficient. Have been here many times and everytime it has been good

title: quick eats
text: The place is the typical McDonalds with the typical menu. Service is excellant and the place is very neat and clean.

title: Birthday celebration dinner
text: Had reservations and was seated promptly. The atmosphere is very relaxing and was greeted by wait person promptly. Letting them know it was for a birthday, the help was kind enough to have a birthday card on the table signed by all the help which was very thoughtful. The service was prompt but not rushed or pushy. Dinner was very well done and the presentation was excellent. Enjoyed all that we ordered and the value is good for the atmosphere and the service and quality of the food.

title: rooms clean but small
text: Was happy with the check in and the staff was very efficient and fast. the rooms are small but clean. It is a very small hotel but has free parking and free breakfast. The internet is included and was working very fast. Downside is the proximity to the airport and you can hear the planes taking off very often. Area is kind of out of the way but the price is very good for a Marriott hotel. Breakfast is good but the area is very small. Items very refilled very rapidly and fresh. Parking on site is limited but has parking on the streets near by.
place: Fairfield Inn New York LaGuardia Airport / Flushing

title: convenient overnight stay to Boston airport
text: The staff was friendly and the breakfast was very good. The shuttle to the airport was efficient. Area is quiet and very scenic by the water. Parking for the stay was included in price of overnight stay for up to 2 weeks and very reasonable and ample.

title: Domestic or International
text: Showed up to check in and check luggage at Vancouver airport. Check in was fast but we were way too early to check in baggage. The confusing thing was that to check baggage, it must be less than 5 hours before flight. The more confusing thing was that I was told that I had to go to the domestic counter to check in the flight. I said I was going to Boston and isn't that international ? They said because I had stopover in Toronto that it was considered domestic. That was surprise to me since the domestic counter was way over to the extreme end of the terminal. At least the girl that told me what to do walked us all the way over to the other counter to make sure I knew where I had to go. That was very good service. Finally checked in later for flight and made connection in Toronto ok. Flight was delayed in Toronto for about 1/2 to 3/4 hrs but made up most of the time on flight. All in all the service was good.

title: Bargain airline
text: The flight was on time and boarding was organized. Service was good. The check in was efficient and quick. Charges for luggage as most do now. Cannot find any reason not to fly with them again.

title: Great Subs
text: The sub sandwichs are made to order fresh when ordered and are quality unlike most sub sandwich shops. The meats are fresh cut and the sandwich is large enough to please a hungrey appetite. Also they sell canned and dry italan favorite items in the store. Must try this place if you not already.

title: Neighborhood Bakery
text: Great pastries and bread. Coffee was good too. The selection varies daily and is very fresh and good. Enjoyed the selections and all were fresh and tasty.

title: This is close to the Residence Inn on Hornby Street.
text: A small strip mall type of place. Family owned and operated. For such a small place the menu is very good and the food is freshly cooked to order. I enjoyed the food very much. Good selections.

title: Great place to visit
text: You can access the island by boat, auto or bus. We went by Hop on Hop off bus and is very convenient. Many eating places and a great farmers market that you really must visit. You will want to buy everything.

title: Friendly good location hotel
text: I had picked this hotel because I am a Marriots rewards member and of where the location in downtown was. It was a very convenient location and close to restaurants, nightlife, local transportation, and tourist areas. The check in was fast and effficent. The help and courteous and helpful and friendly. The included breakfast was excellent.
place: Residence Inn by Marriott Vancouver Downtown

title: Unusual red rock formations
text: A small sized park with unusual formations and a tunnel our of red rock. Hosts many shows and concerts. Did not get the opportunity to see a show but is a very nice place to go anyway, A very clean well kept area and lots of parking. Nice little village at the entrance to park.

title: On time and no baggage fees
text: Every flight that I have ever been on Southwest Airlines has always been on time and the flight attendants are friendly and helpful.

title: game dinners
text: The place is a very popular place for the locals. Usually if the locals like it then it must be good. The atmosphere is very inviting and the service is excellent. The wait person was very personable and the food was excellent. A very eclectic menu, with Bison, Elk, and quail amongst other items. The prices are kind of on the high side but I am not that familiar with pricing in that area. The dining room was full the day we visited and it was a Monday so I assume that it is very popular. A local said that it is always busy and reservations are recommended.

title: Good ltalian food
text: The place is busy so it must be good ! When I travel anywhere, I look for restaurants that are busy. They usually are good food, service and good prices. Do

title: Sushi Sushi Sushi
text: This place is always busy and has the best bento boxes of all the local Japanese Sushi places. Best value for the money and they give you a good amount for the price. I enjoy it everytime I go. The service is always fast and efficient and they are ready to please if there is ever a problem. Of course I have never had a problem there.

title: revitilized train station
text: The place is a nice place for being a train station. Has comfortable seating and many dining options for lunch and dinner.

title: High place to visit
text: The road is a little hairy to drive but I enjoy scenic roads and roads off the normal highways. The views are fantastic and I would do again if I get back to Colorado.

title: Over 14,000 feet above sea level
text: The twist and turns on the highest paved road in the United States was interesting and exciting. I love to drive on roads like this. If you don't like heights then don't but if you do, it is a must ! Reaching the top was great. Loved being up so high in the sky. 14,130 feet above sea level !

title: Oldest restaurant in Denver
text: This place is a place that you must visit. The food is very enjoyable and a little different than your ole burger place. The ambiance is great and makes you feel you went back in history and time. So many things to look at and the help can tell you all kinds of historical facts if you ask. So very interesting place and a place you must visit.

title: The Rockies at its best.
text: A very scenic drive through the Rocky Mountains. You get to see Elk, Moose, Bighorn sheep, and if you are really lucky maybe a bear. I was not lucky enough for that but the scenery is great and a must see National park.

title: Old time theater with ornate decor
text: I remember this theater when they showed all the blockbuster movies back in the forties and fifties and sixties. It became slightly run down when all the new mall theaters were in fashion. Now is has been brought back to original condition and now features live production shows and is great. A must see place and must see shows. A great venue to go to.

title: Waterside Dining
text: The food is excellent here and the atmosphere is great. The service and food is good here. Fine dining at its best.

title: Fish and Chips
text: When you go here it brings back memories of the Rocky Point Park. Although they serve the largest order of Fish and Chips and still have their famous Chowda and clam cakes, its still not the same as it was. The location is not like the park, its on a busy road with lots of traffic going by and the planes from the airport going overhead.

title: Iggys and Iggys boardwalk are good places for local seafood.
text: You can always get a good value at Iggys. Go online or check the newspaper for coupons. Best deal is with coupons. Also around Christmas time they sell gift cards at a discount. Using both makes it a real good deal.

title: Nice ocean views
text: Niice place to bring a picnic basket and soak up the sun and catch the sea breeze and the smell of the ocean. Watch the motor and sail boats go by.

title: good italian food
text: Celebrated event at restaurant. Food was excellent and service was great. Attentive waitperson . Nice atmosphere and comfortable surroundings.

title: Courtesty plus
text: The most courteous flight attendants that I have ever had on any flight. The uniforms were very neat and they all wore the same uniform on board. They bowed each time when they were giving the safety talk. Very attentive and accommodating.
